title: 2018 Junior World Luge Championships
text:
The 33rd <a href="Junior%20World%20Luge%20Championships">Junior World Luge Championships</a> took place under the auspices of the <a href="International%20Luge%20Federation">International Luge Federation</a> at <a href="Altenberg%20bobsleigh%2C%20luge%2C%20and%20skeleton%20track">Altenberg</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a> from 2 to 3 February 2018.
Schedule.
Four events will be held.
